entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
